alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 03 at 3:16AM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur early tomorrow morning through midafternoon tomorrow, and again Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
